headline: Activist Investor Nelson Peltz' Trian Fund Cut Back On This Stock In Q4, But Held Steady On GE Aerospace
summary: Activist investor Trian Fund Management, led by Nelson Peltz, increased stakes in major industrial and healthcare names while trimming more cyclical financial positions in the fourth quarter.
